meanings.definition: A person who trains or teaches others.
meanings.sent1: The trainers at the gym help people learn new exercises.
meanings.sent2: The math trainer explained the problem-solving technique to the students.
meanings.sent3: The trainers had a race to see who could teach the fastest.
meanings.sent4: She was a trainer of minds, molding young students into critical thinkers.
meanings.sent5: The trainers' dedication to their students was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Shoes designed for sports or exercise.
meanings.sent1: I wear my trainers when I go jogging in the park.
meanings.sent2: Her new trainers provided excellent support during her workout.
meanings.sent3: The trainers looked like they were ready to run a marathon on their own!
meanings.sent4: His trainers were like clouds for his feet, making every step comfortable.
meanings.sent5: The bright red trainers stood out among the sea of shoes in the store.
